description:
Overview

Crocs is seeking a Manager of Brand Partnerships on the global marketing team to unlock memorable brand moments and extend our brand reach and awareness through collaborating with a wide range of brand partners. They will play an integral role in connecting Crocs to current events, social / digital trends, authentic brand partners and talent, and quick-to-market opportunities to continue to position Crocs as an innovator in the collaboration and doer spaces. This role will own development of campaign playbooks and execution of Crocs mass appeal partnerships.

What You'll Do

Write and deliver briefs aligned to marketing and company strategies and goals
Collaborate with marketing channel owners and creative teams to develop best in class consumer journeys and creative that aligns with the original brief and utilizes campaign budget most efficiently
Lead projects which involve external partners across various industries with mass consumer appeal
Act as key strategic partner for cross functional teams including product, merchandising and sales teams. Foster collaborative conversations while seeking inputs that will improve program efficacy
Develop program playbooks and oversee the execution of that strategy within all geographic territories
Manage campaign progress measurements ensuring execution translates into engagement, traffic and consumer acquisition
Ensure alignment with legal on all product, partner and marketing activation plans to stay compliant and within contractual terms for the safety of our brand and partners

What You'll Bring to the Table

BS or BA in business, marketing or related field
8+ years marketing experience, highly preferable with a global brand that operates in multiple channels and geographic regions
Footwear, licensing industry and/or talent management experience is a strong plus
A true passion for brand partnerships, digital and a global environment
On top of music, fashion, entertainment and culture trends
Exceptional organizational skills and commitment to excellence with an eye for detail
Ability to work in a fast-paced and ever-changing environment with ability to prioritize workload while under pressure
Effectively manage time and operate with sense of urgency
Strong communication abilities, written and verbal
Adjusts quickly to changing priorities and conditions. Copes effectively with complexity and change

The Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to a diverse and inclusive work environment.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or disability, or any other classification protected by law.

Title: Marketing Manager, Brand Partnerships, Licensing and Collaborations

Salary or Pay Range: $105,000 - $115,000

Workplace Persona: Collaborator

Pay offered will vary based on job-related factors such as location, experience, training, skills, and abilities.

This position is eligible to participate in a company incentive program.

This position is eligible for company benefits including but not limited to medical, dental, and vision coverage, life and AD&D, short and long-term disability coverage, paid time off, employee assistance, participation in a 401k program that includes company match, and many other additional voluntary benefits.

Job Category: Corporate
